description: A collection of circles in a large semi-circular formation with the flat side on the bottom; there is a smaller semi-circular formation below that with the flat side on top, such that the two formations have their flat sides touching. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a reddish-orange triangle at the top of the larger semi-circular formation and another reddish-orange triangle in the bottom left corner of the larger semi-circular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
